metadata.Title: CVE-2023-41360 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0. bgpd/bgp_packet.c can read the initial byte of the ORF header in an ahead-of-stream situation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-41360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.4
frr-pythontools - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.4
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.4
frr-snmp - 8.4.2-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> the quagga project was renamed to frr

criterions.comment: frr package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.4.2-1ubuntu1.4').
